des: "A pink sauce that is great on just about everything.  My family likes it on chicken, fish, game meat, beef, rice...  We have found similar sauces at local Chinese restaurants."
ins: In a medium bowl, stir together the sugar and mustard powder. Whisk in the oil, mayonnaise and ketchup until well blended. Gradually whisk in water. Cover and refrigerate for 4 hours before serving. Use within 5 days.
